name: npm-scripts
description: Example of using NPM scripts for builds.

scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run minify
scripts.build:prod: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 es2017 ] ] | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:js:sass: npm run build; npm run sass
scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- -R tap "./tests/**/*.js" > ./test.tap && istanbul report clover
scripts.transpile: browserify src/main.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 es2017 ] ] | exorcist dist/bundle.js.map > dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch:build: npm run livereload & filewatcher './src/**/*.js' 'npm run build'
scripts.watch:build:prod: npm run livereload & filewatcher './src/**/*.js' 'npm run build:prod'
scripts.watch:sass: npm run livereload & filewatcher './sass/**/*.scss' 'node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-embed true --source-map-root / ./sass/main.scss > ./dist/main.min.css'
scripts.watch:build:js:sass: npm run livereload & filewatcher './src/**/*.js' 'npm run build' & filewatcher './sass/**/*.scss' 'node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-embed true --source-map-root / ./sass/main.scss > ./dist/main.min.css'

author: Brice Bentler
